text: Olympic weightlifting, or Olympic-style weightlifting, often simply referred to as weightlifting, is a sport in which the athlete attempts a maximum-weight single lift of a barbell loaded with weight plates. ==Related pages== * World Weightlifting Championships ==Other websites== * International Weightlifting Federation * Sinclair Calculator * Swiss Amateur Weightlifting Federation (SAGV/FSHA) * Database IWRP * Sinclair Calculator on IWRP 1996-2020 *Weightlifting equipment overview * Weightlifting Videos Category:Weightlifting
title: Olympic weightlifting
